forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 58. West southwest wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 69, with temperatures falling to around 67 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 3 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

weather_report:
This evening in Downtown San Francisco presents a pleasing blend of soft twilight and a gentle breeze. As the sun dips below the horizon, the city appears partly cloaked in wisps of fog that curl and drift through the valleys, creating an atmospheric canvas that flirts between clarity and mystery. The temperature gradually settles around a comfortable 58 degrees, ideal for those who might wish to linger outside, enjoying the breezy companionship of the west-southwest winds.

As dawn unfolds tomorrow, expect a welcoming embrace of mostly sunny skies. The day promises a rise to a vibrant 69 degrees, tapering off to a slightly cooler 67 in the afternoon. The gentle winds will add a refreshing edge, hinting that layers might be your best friend. A light sweater or a light jacket should serve you well against the crispness of early morning, while casual attire suits the shifting warmth of the day. Given the day’s charm, a leisurely stroll along the waterfront beckons, or perhaps a visit to one of the many cozy cafes where the scent of fresh coffee mingles with the briny air. There’s a tranquility in the blend of sun and fog, a gentle reminder that even in a bustling city, moments of peace await those who seek them.
